headline: Novo Nordisk (NVO) Is a Good Short-Term Pick, Wealth Manager Says
summary: Novo Nordisk (NVO), which develops weight-loss drugs, looks poised to perform well over the short term, Rebecca Walser, the founder and principal of Walser Wealth Management, told Schwab Network recently. Walser also identified semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (LRCX) as a good pick for the near term. Why Walser Is Bullish on NVO NVO is […]
